content.raw:
Can we move forward with this proposal for Cave? Due to limited number of cloudsim instances, it would be advantageous to end the runs as soon as possible. 

We can for example detect a situation when the robot can no longer recover and it is not in communication range. If we could call `/<robot>/finish` instead of the global `/subt/finish` we could inform the system that the robot is "done". When all robots are "done", the simulation can quit.

Can we move forward with this proposal for Cave? Due to limited number of cloudsim instances, it would be advantageous to end the runs as soon as possible.

We can for example detect a situation when the robot can no longer recover and it is not in communication range. If we could call /<robot>/finish instead of the global /subt/finish we could inform the system that the robot is "done". When all robots are "done", the simulation can quit.
